name: ragstack-lambda
description: Serverless OCR-to-Knowledge Base pipeline on AWS

scripts.lint: uv run ruff check . --fix && uv run ruff format . && cd src/ui && npm run lint -- --fix
scripts.test: uv run pytest tests/unit/python/ -m 'not integration' && cd src/ui && npm test -- --run && cd ../ragstack-chat && npm test -- --run
scripts.test:coverage: uv run pytest tests/unit/python/ -m 'not integration' --cov=lib --cov=src/lambda --cov-report=html --cov-report=term && cd src/ui && npm run test:coverage
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test
